Iris Nation: Web Application

Iris Nations apps are built on a traditional lamp stack. So getting up and running was fairly simple for me. The backend development team was always interacting with the front-end team. Which made for a pretty neat working environment, that churned out creative apps. I was generally shown how to have fun while building client-side technologies. And I got a chance to build a cool Beyonce Parfums(facebook sdk ) app.
